definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Xian1 qu1 Lun4 tan2 Bao4

sentences.english: Xiang Jingyu is the pioneer of Chinese women liberation.
sentences.chinese: 向警予是中国妇女解放事业的先驱。

sentences.english: Corporations have had the precursor of social networks for ages.
sentences.chinese: 很长时间以来，企业都是社会化网络应用的先驱。

sentences.english: It is a fore-runner of China's reform and opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，深圳是中国改革开放的先驱和样板。

sentences.english: Prof, Zhu Kezhcn is both a pioneer and a founder of modern geography in China.
sentences.chinese: 竺可桢教授是中国近代科学地理学的先驱与奠基人。

sentences.english: Jia Sixie is well-known as a pioneer in farming.
sentences.chinese: 贾思勰是一位有名的农学先驱。

sentences.english: We should remember all those who have gone before us.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该记住所有那些先驱者。

sentences.english: The Prophet is a poetry collection written by Gibran, a forerunner of Arabic contemporary literature.
sentences.chinese: 《先知》是阿拉伯现代文学先驱纪伯伦的一部散文诗。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射。

sentences.english: Ford is a pioneer in the use of biomaterials in vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 福特是在汽车生产领域首先使用生物材料的先驱。

sentences.english: Bronislaw Malinowski and Jonh P. Firth can be regarded as the pioneers of this movement in England.
sentences.chinese: 马林诺夫斯基和弗斯是这一运动的先驱。

sentences.english: Harbor Messenger doesn't come out until Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 《港湾先驱报》要到星期四才出。

sentences.english: The vast majority of pioneers in the hip hop industry have been African-American and Latino.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈业内的大部分先驱者都是非裔美国人和拉丁人。

sentences.english: Little did they know that they were the forerunners for modern agriculture?
sentences.chinese: 他们并不知道自己是现代农业的先驱。

sentences.english: Roman republic is a pioneer of the modern constitutionalism.
sentences.chinese: 罗马共和国是近代立宪主义的先驱。

sentences.english: Mind flayers enslaved entire races, including the githyanki forerunners.
sentences.chinese: 夺心魔奴役着整个种族，包括吉斯洋基人的先驱者们。

sentences.english: He is the vanguard and luminary of global instructor of senior leaders.
sentences.chinese: 全球高级领导者教练领域的先驱与权威者。

definition: the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
representative individual (of a school of thought)
